verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Faithful is He,
Who has started his good work
in me,
every promise He will keep,
every work He will complete,
Faithful is He, Faithful is He.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Time after time we falter
and time after time
God is there for us,
Sharing His grace sufficient
that we over sin might prevail,
and I wonder that He loves us
and still delights
in treasure encased
in vessels of clay.
Demonstrating God's unfailing faithfulness.
